content:
Welcome to the world of Tsokkos Hotels & Resorts, the largest hotel chain in Cyprus with more than 35 years of experience in the hospitality and tourism industry. We offer a wide range of accommodation with 29 hotel properties to choose from in Protaras, Ayia Napa and Paphos.

VIEW HOTELS

A Totally Unique Experience

THE PERFECT PLACE FOR A PERFECT HOLIDAY
